conbody.p: To leverage your testing experience, Katalon Store provides you with a library of plugins developed by Katalon and the Katalon community. The plugins are available on the Katalon Store. However, in some cases, you might want to:

ul.li: Install and use all the plugins that are available on the Store without internet access.
Build your plugins and use them directly in without publishing on the Store. See also: Private Plugins.

conbody.p: Below is a step-by-step guide to installing plugins offline in .

ul.li: An active license for Katalon Studio Enterprise. See .
